channel.title: Git on Paramjot Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Paramjot Singh

item.title: Just Enough... git
item.description: This is just a list of git commands I am currently using. There are tons of tutorials out there as well as quite a few cheat sheets. While those are mostly comprehensive resources, I tend to get distracted and try to learn all commands at once without using them in real projects. That doesn’t help much. Initialize a local git repository git init Cloning an existing project from github
